item.name: Manager Requests

item.description: These are the test requests for Managers try CRUD operations on Managers.

item.name: Managers>>Receptionists
Update Receptionist not Created by Manager
Delete Receptionist not Created by the Manager
Delete Receptionist Created by the Manager
Ban Receptionist not Created by the Manager
Ban Receptionist Created by the Manager
Unban Receptionist not Created by the Manager
Unban Receptionist Created by the Manager

item.description: These are the test requests for Managers making CRUD operations on Receptionists
